title: 如何用粒子画出一个圆环或者抛物线，和做到两个粒子螺旋前进的特效
author: hrminecraft
txt_content:
版本1.13
抛物线我想用summon+算motion
圆环我只会穷举，希望能提供更好的算法
螺旋前进我准备用一支隐形箭，在箭的周围穷举用两个particle围绕箭转，但太复杂了，希望大佬帮忙，提供一个简便点的方法

replies.author: Chelover_C60
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 CHElover_C60 于 2019-8-9 17:56 编辑 

圆和螺旋前进可以考虑局部坐标，抛物线可能稍麻烦，不知道有没有人有更好的方法

圆可以用函数递归
建立计分板
scoreboard objectives add circlr dummy复制代码生成圆时，执行以下命令
summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Tags:["ciecle"]}
execute as @e[tag=circle] at @s run function minecraft:circle
kill @e[tag=ciecle]复制代码minecraft:circle.mcfunction
particle minecraft:heart ^ ^ ^10
tp @s ~ ~ ~ ~10 ~
acoreboard players add @s circle 1
execute if score @s circle matches ..35 run function minecraft:circle复制代码

螺旋前进可以用以下方法
summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Tags:["mark"],NoGravity:1}复制代码循环执行以下命令
execute as @e[type=armor_stand,tag=mark,x_rotation=-90] at @s run tp @s ~ ~ ~ ~ 90
execute as @e[type=armor_stand,tag=mark] at @s run tp @s ~ ~ ~ ~ ~-10
execute at @e[type=armor_stand,tag=mark] run particle minecraft:heart ^ ^ ^2
execute at @e[type=armor_stand,tag=mark] run particle minecraft:heart ^ ^ ^-2
execute as @e[type=armor_stand,tag=mark] at @s run tp @s ^0.5 ^ ^复制代码

抛物线较麻烦，我套用了好多个递归才拿下，不知道有没有人有更好的方法
scoreboard objectives add move dummy
scoreboard objectives add time dummy复制代码游戏内执行
summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Tags:["parabolic"]}
scoreboard players set @e[tag=parabolic] move 7
execute as @e[type=armor_stand,tag=parabolic] at @s run function minecraft:parabolic
kill @e[tag=parabolic]复制代码parabolic.mcfunction
scoreboard players operation @s time = @s move
execute if score @s move matches 1.. run function minecraft:up
execute if score @s move matches ..-1 run function minecraft:down
particle minecraft:heart ~ ~ ~
tp ^ ^ ^1
scoreboard players remove @s move 1
execute unless score @s move matches -7 run function minecraft:parabolic复制代码up.mcfunction
execute at @s run tp ~ ~1 ~
scoreboard players remove @s time 1
execute unless score @s time matches 0 run function minecraft:up复制代码down.mcfunction
execute at @s run tp ~ ~-1 ~
scoreboard players add @s time 1
execute unless score @s time matches 0 run function minecraft:up复制代码
